[Home](./index.md)



## Packages

|  Package | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-app](./sequence-viewer-app.md) | Ready to use sequence viewer component using material UI |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-backend-react-state](./sequence-viewer-backend-react-state.md) | Creates an annotation backend that stores annotations in React.setState |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-circular](./sequence-viewer-react-circular.md) | Renders interactive circular viewer |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-linear](./sequence-viewer-react-linear.md) | Renders interactive linear viewer |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-mui](./sequence-viewer-react-mui.md) | Contains a few helpful react material UI components |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-mui-formik-form](./sequence-viewer-react-mui-formik-form.md) | Ready to use annotation form, to edit and create annotations using material UI and formik |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-shared](./sequence-viewer-react-shared.md) | Contains a few types and utilities for using the react circular controller |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-render-circular](./sequence-viewer-render-circular.md) | Draws the circle on a canvas |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-render-linear](./sequence-viewer-render-linear.md) | Draws the linear sequence viewer on a canvas |
|  [@anocca/sequence-viewer-utils](./sequence-viewer-utils.md) | Contains utilities, types and constants used by all @anocca/sequence-viewer- packages |
